CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 21, 1955, pg. 17 reads: "The Winner - Thomas J. Smith (second from left), nominated on the Democratic ticket for constable in last Tuesday's primary elections, takes time out to chat with workers in front of Ammon Center. Reading from left to right: Adrena Allen, Smith, Lula Hatcher, Dewey Foulkes.  Informed Wednesday morning that he had won out, "Tommy" replied, please say for me: "I thank the people." - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Adrena Allen, Thomas "Tommy" Smith, Lula Hatcher, and Dewey Foulkes, posed in front of Ammon Center during the 1955 primary elections
